Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice

An i2 Analyze external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService
    A set of methods for performing searches of various kinds against a data subset that has been created from an external data provider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheInaccessibleException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing CacheInaccessibleException.
    CacheTimeoutException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing CacheTimeoutException.
    ExternalDataSourceException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing ExternalDataSourceException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CacheInaccessibleException
    The exception raised when an IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService method attempts to search in or retrieve results from an item cache that is inaccessible.
    CacheTimeoutException
    The exception raised when an IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService method attempts to search in or retrieve results from an item cache that has timed out.
    ExternalDataSourceException
    The exception raised when a service method performs an operation that causes an error during processing of an external data subset, or querying of an external data source.

Package com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice Description

An i2 Analyze external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider.

The operations supported by an external data subset exploration service build on those offered by an external data subset creation service. An external data subset exploration service makes eight web methods available for clients to call:

Web methodDescription
Initialize Initializes the service by creating an item cache from the data in the subset. After this call, the subset is ready for access through the other data subset exploration service methods.
GetLatestItems Gets the latest versions of specific items in the data subset, as identified through their provenance information.
Search Executes a search within the data subset for items that match a range of criteria, and returns a summary of the search results.
DumbbellSearch Executes a search within the data subset for items that match a range of criteria and occur in dumbbells with a specified structure, and returns a summary of the search results.
NetworkSearch Executes a search within the data subset for groups of items that together match a range of criteria, and returns a summary of the search results.
Expand Returns links and entities from the data subset, filtered by type, that are connected to entities that have previously been retrieved.
Retrieve Returns results containing items that were found by an earlier call to Search or DumbbellSearch, filtered according to a range of criteria.
NetworkRetrieve Returns results containing items that were found by an earlier call to NetworkSearch, filtered according to a range of criteria.

Some external data subset exploration services work with subsets that were created by third-party implementations of the IExternalDataSubsetCreationService interface. Other data subset exploration services create the subsets that they explore. The solution creator can choose how best to interact with a particular data source.

Since:
3.1
